Introduction

VX (Korean: 브이엑스) was a five-member group from JJ Entertainment that debuted with the song "Fantasy." Their member lineup includes Jinhwa, Siyoon, JT, Jeki, and La-e. Their official fandom name is Sunshine.

Current state:
disbanded
